frontmatter.title: InfiniteScroll
frontmatter.description: InfiniteScroll is a plugin that manages automating pagination loads with infinite scrolling.

children.value: to load items. Also remember to set
to resume previous state when using back/forward browser buttons. Ensure
is working on your environment (some extensions can disable this), or use
Depending on website content the load more content may retain website scroll, use
you can use this strings that gets populated with variables:
Restore scroll position on back and forward browser buttons
List of space separated events to trigger infinite scroll
Container query for trigger elements when scrolling up
Container query for trigger elements when scrolling down
Container query for additional space when resuming pages
. You can use different queries with different and nested options.
Add additional options on match media query
let self = Xt.get({ name: 'xt-infinitescroll', el: document.querySelector('.my-container') })
for all components of the same type, with
Listen to events, for listeners use

let self = Xt.get({ name: 'xt-infinitescroll', el: document.querySelector('.my-container') })
const container = self.container
for when the infinitescroll is on first or on last page.

frontmatter.description: InfiniteScroll is a plugin that manages automating pagination loads with infinite scrolling.
